featured.text: Speech that is slow, because it is laced with pauses or errors, is a more reliable indicator of lying than the opposite. 41.
We may say we don't want our children to drink, but our messages say just the opposite.
Actually, quite the opposite is true.
However, the opposite is a greater cause for suspicion.

other.text: It is a tailored garment that is wrapped around the wearer’s body at the waist starting from one side, around the front and back and across the front again to the opposite side.
Which word in the poem is opposite in meaning to running? 5.

definition.en_def: A thing that is completely different from something else; a contrary.
definition.example: The opposite of hot is cold.
